All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Barrier
This class represents a Barrier on the board, an object that characters cannot move through and items cannot spawn on.
BearTrap
This class represents a BearTrap on the game board.
Board
The main GUI application for the game.
BoardSpace
This class is responsible for setting up the skeleton and framework of the actual board.
Butcher
Class for Butchers on the Board.
Coordinate
Class Coordinate is used for holding the x and y coordinates values on the Board Space 2D array.
Direction
Specifies the directions that the game uses for logic
ItemType
This enumeration specifies which class an item is an object of.
MagicCorn
This class represents a MagicCorn object that will be placed on the board This serves as the regular reward and will be collected by Wilbur coming into contact with it Coming into contact with the Magic Corn will increment the total points by a set amount All Magic Corn on the board is required to be collected to move on to the next level Holds the image file for MagicCorn Contains constructor for the Magic Corn
MagicTruffle
This class serves as a Bonus Reward that increments the same amount of points as MagicCorn but also grants Wilbur invincibility as a bonus for a set amount of time when Wilbur comes into contact with it.
Main
Class to contain the invocation of the Board GUI
Menu
Holds the background image objects for the main menu
MovingCharacter
The MovingCharacters class is the super class for Wilbur and Butcher classes.
Path
Class for making Paths on the board that the characters are allowed to walk on.
StationaryModifier
This class serves as a parent class for any non-moving object to be placed on the board BearTrap, MagicCorn and MagicTruffle will extend StationaryModifier Holds all the static values that will alter points such as how much to increment the score when a Corn is picked up Holds coordinate attribute of objects on the board Holds visibility attribute that dictates if an object is painted on the board Holds upperbounds for X and Y coordinates for when the random function is used
Wilbur
This is the class for the Main Player called Wilbur.
